name: places/ChIJuXnbw7lZwokRK2Vnkc1UOHo
formattedAddress: 420 W 24th St Suite 1F, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 420 W 24th St Suite 1F, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
I have been going to Marta since 2002 when I moved to the city. Originally, I was in search of electrolysis services but then once I got to know Marta, I understood she did so much more and WELL!

I had everything from laser hair removal, to unbelievable facials to other skin improvement treatments. Marta truly cares about helping her clients resolve what ever they need and educates on preventative skin aging measures as well. It is a holistic experience and Marta is great! I highly recommend this Company!!!

originalText.text: I've been coming here for 3 years and WOW.... I saw a tremendous difference in my skin. For years I tried to get rid of the blackheads on my nose, oily skin and acne. I used all different types of acne treatments that did more damage than good. When I first came here I got a Skin Control Laser Facial from Marta and it really help cleared and smooth my skin out. Her facial is simply the best! Marta also educated me on what products to use. Her recommended non-irritating cream along with her facials gave me clear glowing skin. I highly recommend her treatmeants if you are struggling with yours! Aside from that she is one of the kindest people I know!

originalText.text: I've been going to Marta for over 3 years now and she is the best! What she does really works and her facials are the only thing that finally got my skin under control (before I found her I tried everything, including Accutane). She's also extremely nice and easy to talk to, which makes the whole experience even more comfortable and relaxing.

What she does really works and her facials are the only thing that finally got my skin under control (before I found her I tried everything, including Accutane). She's also extremely nice and easy to talk to, which makes the whole experience even more comfortable and relaxing.

originalText.text: I have been going to Skin Laser Studio for almost a year now and I can not say enough great things about Marta! She is so kind and truly cares about her clients skin. It is evident that she is in this field because she truly has a passion and great knowledge about skincare. I have been going to her for facials and smooth beam for breakouts and every time I go to her my skin is smooth and bump free! I also like that she does not push any products onto you, rather suggests what would be best. At no point have I ever felt pressured to buy a product or book an appointment. She lets me go at my own pace and is always accommodating to my schedule. I drive 45 mins to see her because she really is that great.

originalText.text: It has been about 2 months since I had my "perfect skin" laser facial and my skin still looks amazing! I travel to NYC a few times a year from France. On this last visit, I wanted to have a really good facial that combined many techniques (laser, micro-dermabrasion etc). I have a large net work of friends in NYC who recommended me to their skin specialists however no one did what Skin Laser Studios offered. So I gave it a shot and I was so pleasantly surprised by the incredible results! I had my  facial with Adriana and then a follow up session and consultation with Marta. Marta has an extremely in depth knowledge of skin and how to properly treat it. Her advice was very helpful and it is clear she truly cares about her clients. I had noticeably glowing perfect skin for weeks and weeks. Even now, my skin tone is much more balanced. The skin care line sold at S.L.S. is also very affordable and is keeping my skin in check. I would highly recommend seeing Marta and book a treatment at Skin Laser Studios! I have already advised my friend in NYC to do the same. I look forward to my next treatment when I am back to NYC!
